problem_name: HOW MANY DIGITS DO I HAVE
body: All submissions for this problem are available.Write a program to obtain a number $(N)$ from the user and display whether the number is a one digit number, 2 digit number, 3 digit number or more than 3 digit number ###Input: - First line will contain the number $N$, ###Output: Print "1" if N is a 1 digit number. Print "2" if N is a 2 digit number. Print "3" if N is a 3 digit number. Print "More than 3 digits" if N has more than 3 digits. ###Constraints - $0 \leq N \leq 1000000$ ###Sample Input: 9 ###Sample Output: 1
languages_supported: C, CPP14, JAVA, PYTH, PYTH 3.6, PYPY, CS2, PAS fpc, PAS gpc, RUBY, PHP, GO, NODEJS, HASK, rust, SCALA, swift, D, PERL, FORT, WSPC, ADA, CAML, ICK, BF, ASM, CLPS, PRLG, ICON, SCM qobi, PIKE, ST, NICE, LUA, BASH, NEM, LISP sbcl, LISP clisp, SCM guile, JS, ERL, TCL, kotlin, PERL6, TEXT, SCM chicken, PYP3, CLOJ, COB, FS
problem_author_html_handle: 4★tanmay28
